inch.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a unit for measuring length, equal to 2.54 centimetres. There are 12 inches in a foot
inch.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: The curtains were an inch too short.
Rainfall here is under 15 inches a year.
inch.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: Derek leaned closer, his face only inches from hers.
The bus missed us by inches.
On several occasions, they came within inches of death.
inch.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to move very slowly in a particular direction, or to make something do this
inch.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: I inched forward along the ground.
inch.translation[2].definitions[0].defin: a unit for measuring length, equal to 2.54 centimetres
